transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Executive: Haan, Mr. Ahmed baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: From India House, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ahmed Sahab, very good afternoon. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Main badhiya. Badhiya sir.
Executive: Mera naam Prashant hai. Main IndiaMART office se baat kar raha hu, senior manager. Actually do din pehle Anju aayi thi, abhi aaj bhi aayi hai mere paas. Kuch extra approval vagera ko leke kuch discussion chal raha hai aap logo ka na? To ye maximization mujhe kuch leke.
Customer: Main aapko batau, main aapko batata hu actually me main bahut jyada busy chal raha hu us time pe.
Executive: Haan, mujhe pata hai. Anju ne bataya tha ki aap bahut jyada busy chal rahe hain.
Customer: Uski vajah se main filhal bilkul bhi na unko bhi unse bhi baat kar pa raha hu na main matlab.
Executive: Haan, main samajh raha hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thoda sa samay chahiye jyada nahi chahiye agar koi confusion hai deal ko leke.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Kyunki website wali services hai, kuch extra approval vagera tha.
Customer: Main, main aapko batata hu asal me mujhe ye sab cheeze na apne father se consult karni padti hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To abhi father dusri office me baithte hain, main factory me rehta hu. To abhi thoda sa hamare me wo ho nahi pa raha. Ki time nahi mil raha. Raat ko time milta hai to main ghar der se jata hu to wo so jate hain.
Executive: To aaj most probably aaj main shayad jaunga office to main jab baat karta hu fir main Anju mam se jo bhi baat hogi main jaise bhi hoga main unhe. Nahi ek final pricing ke liye discussion karna tha mujhe.
Executive: Thik hai. Kyunki ₹20,000 ka discount tha two year and three year ki services pe, right? Aur kuch extra approval vagera bhi the.
Executive: To thoda sa vahi hai ki agar aapke paas se samay mil paaye to bataiye mere paas jo coupon vagera pada hai main un sab cheezo ko laga ke aapke sath ek bar baith ke final bata baat kar lete hain ki aapko domain kya milega. Aap ek kam kariye. Aap mujhe approximately shayad 4 baje ke aas pass phone kar lijiye. Main thoda office ka kam bhi hai main filhal bahar hu. To main jyada der baat nahi kar paunga main driving kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan, thik hai, thik hai, thik hai. Thik hai na aap 4 baje ke aas pass phone kar lijiye. To website vagera bhi decide kar lenge ki kaun si website aapke liye uchit rahegi, right?
Customer: Thik hai, okay, okay.
Executive: Agar, agar sahi, sahi lagega aapko to main bas 5-10 minute ke liye ek link share kar dunga. Us link ko join kar dijiyega to usse aasan ho jayega ki sab kuch dikha ke main kar dunga. Thik hai?
Customer: Okay, okay, okay. 4 baje, 4 baje, 4 baje, thik hai.
Executive: Okay, okay. Okay, sure. Thik hai samay jarur dijiyega sir. Thik hai. Kyunki thode se limited hai mere paas coupon vagera. Thik hai, thik hai, main samajh gaya wo koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is busy and needs to consult father.

- Needs to finalize pricing and website details.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to discuss final pricing.

- Agreed to discuss website options.

- Executive will share a link for easy discussion.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back at 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, pricing, website, approval
